effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Power is doubled if the user’s last move failed for any reason (i.e., produced the message "But it failed!") or was ineffective due to types.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Power is doubled if the user’s last move failed for any reason (i.e., produced the message "But it failed!") or was ineffective due to types.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Power is doubled if the user’s last move failed for any reason (i.e., produced the message "But it failed!") or was ineffective due to types.

short_effect.sun_moon: Has double power if the user’s last move failed.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Has double power if the user’s last move failed.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Has double power if the user’s last move failed.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If the user’s previous move has failed, the power of this move doubles.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If the user’s previous move has failed, the power of this move doubles.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If the user’s previous move has failed, the power of this move doubles.
